ta.title: லிட்ரோ எரிவாயு விலைகள் குறைக்கப்படும்
body_lines: உள்நாட்டு எரிவாயு சிலிண்டரின் புதிய விலை ரூ.
விலையைக் குறைப்பதற்கான செலவு தற்போது நள்ளிரவில் இருந்து திறக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது.

en.title: Litro gas prices will be reduced
body_lines: Accordingly, the price of a 12.5 kilogram has been reduced by Rs. 100.
The price of a 5 kghony gas cylinder has been reduced by Rs.
The new price of a 2.3-kilo of domestic gas cylinder is Rs. 694 and a cylinder has been reduced by 18 rupees.
The cost of reducing the price is currently inaugurated from midnight.

summary_lines: Gas prices have decreased: a 12.5 kg cylinder now costs Rs. 100 less, a 5 kg one also saw a reduction, and a 2.3 kg cylinder is priced at Rs. 694, down from Rs. 712. These changes took effect at midnight.
